description.ko: 유기적 생명과 빛이 생물 발광 막을 통해 조화롭게 호흡하는 자연의 내부 리듬을 시각화한 작품입니다.
description.en: A visualization of nature's internal rhythm, where organic life and light breathe in unison through bioluminescent membranes.

prompt: An ultra-detailed cinematic 3D render of AURA-7 embodying Organic Flow. A pulsating respiratory organ formed from layers of translucent #7FB069 emerald moss and deep #2D5A3D vascular vines drifts in a silent #E6F2E1 pearlescent haze. The entity exhales bioluminescent #FFE66D golden spores that move like liquid light. Macro focus on the organic membranes, soft undulating movement, hyper-realistic fluid dynamics, 8k resolution, Octane render, serene and divine natural atmosphere.
